We're breaking it open!\""},{"lineNumber":68438,"originalJapaneseLine":"半ばヤケ気味に、魔物兵たちは拳を上げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Half in desperation, the demon soldiers raised their fists."},{"lineNumber":68439,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵がいれば、叩き潰して食料を奪え！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If there are enemies, crush them and steal their supplies!"},{"lineNumber":68440,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここを抜ければ、敵の司令部は襲い放題だぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Once we get through here, the enemy headquarters will be wide open for attack!\""},{"lineNumber":68441,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちぇ、簡単に言ってくれるぜ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, you say it so easily...\""},{"lineNumber":68442,"originalJapaneseLine":"　将軍殿はたっぷり食ってるからってよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"They say the general's been eating plenty...\""},{"lineNumber":68443,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しっ、よせよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Shh, cut it out.\""},{"lineNumber":68444,"originalJapaneseLine":"「突撃！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Charge!\""},{"lineNumber":68445,"originalJapaneseLine":"号令一下、魔物兵たちが城門に襲いかかる。","translatedEnglishLine":"At the command, the demon soldiers rushed the castle gate."},{"lineNumber":68446,"originalJapaneseLine":"城門からは部隊が繰り出されるでもなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"No troops sallied forth from the gate,"},{"lineNumber":68447,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵たちは殺到する勢いのまま――","translatedEnglishLine":"and the demon soldiers surged forward with full momentum—"},{"lineNumber":68448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、う、うおあああああぁぁっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh, ugh, uoaahhhh!?\""},{"lineNumber":68449,"originalJapaneseLine":"――門の前に作られた巨大な落とし穴に、","translatedEnglishLine":"—into a huge pitfall dug in front of the gate,"},{"lineNumber":68450,"originalJapaneseLine":"数百人がまとめて転落した。","translatedEnglishLine":"hundreds of them fell all at once."},{"lineNumber":68451,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やー……流石はポピンズの作業機械。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow... As expected from Poppins' work machines."},{"lineNumber":68452,"originalJapaneseLine":"　土木工事に強いと助かるねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Being good at civil engineering sure helps.\""},{"lineNumber":68453,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な……が、あ…………！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no... gah...!?\""},{"lineNumber":68454,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ば、ばかばかばか！　罠だ、止まれッ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-idiot, idiot, idiot! It's a trap, stop...!\""},{"lineNumber":68455,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おおおおいッ！　止まれってさーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-hey! I said stop—!"},{"lineNumber":68456,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おい、聞こえ……ぐぇっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, do you hear me...ugh!\""},{"lineNumber":68457,"originalJapaneseLine":"最初に転落したのは数百人でも、","translatedEnglishLine":"Though only hundreds fell initially,"},{"lineNumber":68458,"originalJapaneseLine":"被害はそれに留まらなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the casualties did not end there."},{"lineNumber":68459,"originalJapaneseLine":"数万を超える縦列は急に止まる事などできず、","translatedEnglishLine":"The tens of thousands in the lines couldn't stop suddenly,"},{"lineNumber":68460,"originalJapaneseLine":"落ちた者の後列がまた転落し、","translatedEnglishLine":"and those behind who fell pushed others down,"},{"lineNumber":68461,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを繰り返して隊列は乱れに乱れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"repeating this, the formation became completely disordered."},{"lineNumber":68462,"originalJapaneseLine":"落とし穴は大きく、深く作られていただけで","translatedEnglishLine":"The pitfall was only made large and deep,"},{"lineNumber":68463,"originalJapaneseLine":"底に仕掛けはなかったが、僚友に押し潰されて","translatedEnglishLine":"with no traps at the bottom, but crushed by comrades,"},{"lineNumber":68464,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵たちは何をするでもなく圧死していった。","translatedEnglishLine":"the demon soldiers were crushed to death without doing anything."},{"lineNumber":68465,"originalJapaneseLine":"巨人部隊のデカント達まで転落するに至り、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even the giant unit Dekants fell in, resulting in,"},{"lineNumber":68466,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場は大混乱に陥った。","translatedEnglishLine":"the battlefield falling into great chaos."},{"lineNumber":68467,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おおおっ……！　篠田殿、撃ちますか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh...! Lord Shinoda, shall we fire?\""},{"lineNumber":68468,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、いいのいいの。撤退するよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, it's fine. We're retreating."},{"lineNumber":68469,"originalJapaneseLine":"　借りてきた器兵だけ離して、撃たせて」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just release only the borrowed artillery, and let them fire.\""},{"lineNumber":68470,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そうなのですか……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-is that so...?\""},{"lineNumber":68471,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん。てばさき隊に運んでもらって。次だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah. Have the wing team carry them away. Next.\""},{"lineNumber":68472,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、ぬ、ぐおおおお！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, nuh, guooooah!"},{"lineNumber":68473,"originalJapaneseLine":"　体勢を立て直せ！　あの門を破れ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Regain your stance! Break through that gate!\""},{"lineNumber":68474,"originalJapaneseLine":"「し、しかしこの状態は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-but this situation is...\""},{"lineNumber":68475,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どれだけの兵数がいると思っている。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you realize how many soldiers there are?"},{"lineNumber":68476,"originalJapaneseLine":"　救助は後回しだ！　押し破れ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rescue comes later! Break through!\""},{"lineNumber":68477,"originalJapaneseLine":"高所からの器兵の攻撃に悩まされながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"While troubled by artillery attacks from above,"},{"lineNumber":68478,"originalJapaneseLine":"城門に攻撃が始まる。","translatedEnglishLine":"the attack on the castle gate began."},{"lineNumber":68479,"originalJapaneseLine":"固く閉ざされた重い門をどうにかこじ開け、","translatedEnglishLine":"They somehow pried open the heavy, firmly closed gate,"},{"lineNumber":68480,"originalJapaneseLine":"その先の光景が魔軍の前に広がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the scene beyond spread out before the demon army."},{"lineNumber":68481,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おおおぉ、開くぞ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ooh, it's opening...!\""},{"lineNumber":68482,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、片っ端から叩き潰して……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, crush them all one by one...\""},{"lineNumber":68483,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...\""},{"lineNumber":68484,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……な……何も、ない……だと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Wha... nothing... is here?!\""},{"lineNumber":68485,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこには、それまでと同じ荒涼とした山道が","translatedEnglishLine":"There was nothing but the same desolate mountain path as before."},{"lineNumber":68486,"originalJapaneseLine":"続いているだけだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It just continued onward."},{"lineNumber":68487,"originalJapaneseLine":"「初めっから、門だけの張りぼて……か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From the very start, it was just a fake gate... huh...\""},{"lineNumber":68488,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マジかよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seriously...?\""},{"lineNumber":68489,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵の口の端から、呻きが漏れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"A groan slipped from the corner of a demon soldier's mouth."},{"lineNumber":68490,"originalJapaneseLine":"徒労感を強く感じさせるような光景だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a sight that strongly evoked a sense of futility."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一発が足を掠めて、ぐらりと身体が揺れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A shot grazed my leg, and my body swayed unsteadily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、しまったー。倒せなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, damn it— I couldn't take it down."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、ざかしい真似をッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-you insolent act...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍の冷静な判断力は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general's calm judgment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たちまち沸騰して消え去った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: boiled over and vanished in an instant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総員攻城戦用意！　こじ開けるぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All units, prepare for siege assault! We're breaking it open!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半ばヤケ気味に、魔物兵たちは拳を上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Half in desperation, the demon soldiers raised their fists.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵がいれば、叩き潰して食料を奪え！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If there are enemies, crush them and steal their supplies!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを抜ければ、敵の司令部は襲い放題だぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once we get through here, the enemy headquarters will be wide open for attack!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちぇ、簡単に言ってくれるぜ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, you say it so easily..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍殿はたっぷり食ってるからってよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say the general's been eating plenty..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっ、よせよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shh, cut it out."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「突撃！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Charge!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 号令一下、魔物兵たちが城門に襲いかかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the command, the demon soldiers rushed the castle gate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城門からは部隊が繰り出されるでもなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No troops sallied forth from the gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵たちは殺到する勢いのまま――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the demon soldiers surged forward with full momentum—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、う、うおあああああぁぁっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-oh, ugh, uoaahhhh!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――門の前に作られた巨大な落とし穴に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —into a huge pitfall dug in front of the gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数百人がまとめて転落した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hundreds of them fell all at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やー……流石はポピンズの作業機械。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow... As expected from Poppins' work machines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 土木工事に強いと助かるねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being good at civil engineering sure helps."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ば、ばかばかばか！　罠だ、止まれッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-idiot, idiot, idiot! It's a trap, stop...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおおいッ！　止まれってさーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-hey! I said stop—!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、聞こえ……ぐぇっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, do you hear me...ugh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初に転落したのは数百人でも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though only hundreds fell initially,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 被害はそれに留まらなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the casualties did not end there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数万を超える縦列は急に止まる事などできず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The tens of thousands in the lines couldn't stop suddenly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落ちた者の後列がまた転落し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and those behind who fell pushed others down,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを繰り返して隊列は乱れに乱れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: repeating this, the formation became completely disordered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落とし穴は大きく、深く作られていただけで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The pitfall was only made large and deep,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 底に仕掛けはなかったが、僚友に押し潰されて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with no traps at the bottom, but crushed by comrades,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵たちは何をするでもなく圧死していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon soldiers were crushed to death without doing anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨人部隊のデカント達まで転落するに至り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the giant unit Dekants fell in, resulting in,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場は大混乱に陥った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the battlefield falling into great chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおっ……！　篠田殿、撃ちますか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-oh...! Lord Shinoda, shall we fire?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、いいのいいの。撤退するよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, it's fine. We're retreating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 借りてきた器兵だけ離して、撃たせて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just release only the borrowed artillery, and let them fire."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうなのですか……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-is that so...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん。てばさき隊に運んでもらって。次だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. Have the wing team carry them away. Next."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、ぬ、ぐおおおお！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, nuh, guooooah!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体勢を立て直せ！　あの門を破れ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regain your stance! Break through that gate!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「し、しかしこの状態は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-but this situation is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どれだけの兵数がいると思っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you realize how many soldiers there are?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 救助は後回しだ！　押し破れ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rescue comes later! Break through!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高所からの器兵の攻撃に悩まされながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While troubled by artillery attacks from above,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城門に攻撃が始まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the attack on the castle gate began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 固く閉ざされた重い門をどうにかこじ開け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They somehow pried open the heavy, firmly closed gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その先の光景が魔軍の前に広がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the scene beyond spread out before the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おおおぉ、開くぞ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ooh, it's opening...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、片っ端から叩き潰して……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, crush them all one by one..."
"...Wha... nothing... is here?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこには、それまでと同じ荒涼とした山道が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was nothing but the same desolate mountain path as before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 続いているだけだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It just continued onward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「初めっから、門だけの張りぼて……か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From the very start, it was just a fake gate... huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジかよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seriously...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵の口の端から、呻きが漏れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A groan slipped from the corner of a demon soldier's mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徒労感を強く感じさせるような光景だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a sight that strongly evoked a sense of futility.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Break through that gate!\""},{"lineNumber":68474,"originalJapaneseLine":"「し、しかしこの状態は……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-but this situation is...\""},{"lineNumber":68475,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どれだけの兵数がいると思っている。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you realize how many soldiers there are?"},{"lineNumber":68476,"originalJapaneseLine":"　救助は後回しだ！　押し破れ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rescue comes later! Break through!\""},{"lineNumber":68477,"originalJapaneseLine":"高所からの器兵の攻撃に悩まされながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"While troubled by artillery attacks from above,"},{"lineNumber":68478,"originalJapaneseLine":"城門に攻撃が始まる。","translatedEnglishLine":"the attack on the castle gate began."},{"lineNumber":68479,"originalJapaneseLine":"固く閉ざされた重い門をどうにかこじ開け、","translatedEnglishLine":"They somehow pried open the heavy, firmly closed gate,"},{"lineNumber":68480,"originalJapaneseLine":"その先の光景が魔軍の前に広がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the scene beyond spread out before the demon army."},{"lineNumber":68481,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おおおぉ、開くぞ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ooh, it's opening...!\""},{"lineNumber":68482,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、片っ端から叩き潰して……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, crush them all one by one...\""},{"lineNumber":68483,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...\""},{"lineNumber":68484,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……な……何も、ない……だと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Wha... nothing... is here?!\""},{"lineNumber":68485,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこには、それまでと同じ荒涼とした山道が","translatedEnglishLine":"There was nothing but the same desolate mountain path as before."},{"lineNumber":68486,"originalJapaneseLine":"続いているだけだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It just continued onward."},{"lineNumber":68487,"originalJapaneseLine":"「初めっから、門だけの張りぼて……か……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"From the very start, it was just a fake gate... huh...\""},{"lineNumber":68488,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マジかよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seriously...?\""},{"lineNumber":68489,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵の口の端から、呻きが漏れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"A groan slipped from the corner of a demon soldier's mouth."},{"lineNumber":68490,"originalJapaneseLine":"徒労感を強く感じさせるような光景だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a sight that strongly evoked a sense of futility."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一発が足を掠めて、ぐらりと身体が揺れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A shot grazed my leg, and my body swayed unsteadily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、しまったー。倒せなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, damn it— I couldn't take it down."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、ざかしい真似をッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-you insolent act...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍の冷静な判断力は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general's calm judgment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たちまち沸騰して消え去った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: boiled over and vanished in an instant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総員攻城戦用意！　こじ開けるぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All units, prepare for siege assault! We're breaking it open!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半ばヤケ気味に、魔物兵たちは拳を上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Half in desperation, the demon soldiers raised their fists.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「敵がいれば、叩き潰して食料を奪え！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If there are enemies, crush them and steal their supplies!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを抜ければ、敵の司令部は襲い放題だぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once we get through here, the enemy headquarters will be wide open for attack!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちぇ、簡単に言ってくれるぜ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, you say it so easily..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍殿はたっぷり食ってるからってよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say the general's been eating plenty..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっ、よせよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shh, cut it out."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「突撃！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Charge!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 号令一下、魔物兵たちが城門に襲いかかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the command, the demon soldiers rushed the castle gate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城門からは部隊が繰り出されるでもなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No troops sallied forth from the gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵たちは殺到する勢いのまま――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the demon soldiers surged forward with full momentum—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、う、うおあああああぁぁっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-oh, ugh, uoaahhhh!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――門の前に作られた巨大な落とし穴に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —into a huge pitfall dug in front of the gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数百人がまとめて転落した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hundreds of them fell all at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やー……流石はポピンズの作業機械。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow... As expected from Poppins' work machines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 土木工事に強いと助かるねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being good at civil engineering sure helps."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ば、ばかばかばか！　罠だ、止まれッ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-idiot, idiot, idiot! It's a trap, stop...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおおいッ！　止まれってさーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "H-hey! I said stop—!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、聞こえ……ぐぇっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, do you hear me...ugh!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初に転落したのは数百人でも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though only hundreds fell initially,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 被害はそれに留まらなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the casualties did not end there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数万を超える縦列は急に止まる事などできず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The tens of thousands in the lines couldn't stop suddenly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落ちた者の後列がまた転落し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and those behind who fell pushed others down,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを繰り返して隊列は乱れに乱れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: repeating this, the formation became completely disordered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落とし穴は大きく、深く作られていただけで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The pitfall was only made large and deep,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 底に仕掛けはなかったが、僚友に押し潰されて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with no traps at the bottom, but crushed by comrades,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵たちは何をするでもなく圧死していった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon soldiers were crushed to death without doing anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨人部隊のデカント達まで転落するに至り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the giant unit Dekants fell in, resulting in,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場は大混乱に陥った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the battlefield falling into great chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、おおおっ……！　篠田殿、撃ちますか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-oh...! Lord Shinoda, shall we fire?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、いいのいいの。撤退するよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, it's fine. We're retreating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 借りてきた器兵だけ離して、撃たせて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just release only the borrowed artillery, and let them fire."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうなのですか……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-is that so...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん。てばさき隊に運んでもらって。次だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. Have the wing team carry them away. Next."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、ぬ、ぐおおおお！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, nuh, guooooah!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 体勢を立て直せ！　あの門を破れ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regain your stance! Break through that gate!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「し、しかしこの状態は……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-but this situation is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どれだけの兵数がいると思っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you realize how many soldiers there are?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 救助は後回しだ！　押し破れ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rescue comes later! Break through!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高所からの器兵の攻撃に悩まされながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While troubled by artillery attacks from above,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城門に攻撃が始まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the attack on the castle gate began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 固く閉ざされた重い門をどうにかこじ開け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They somehow pried open the heavy, firmly closed gate,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その先の光景が魔軍の前に広がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the scene beyond spread out before the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おおおぉ、開くぞ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ooh, it's opening...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、片っ端から叩き潰して……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, crush them all one by one..."
"...Wha... nothing... is here?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこには、それまでと同じ荒涼とした山道が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was nothing but the same desolate mountain path as before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 続いているだけだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It just continued onward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「初めっから、門だけの張りぼて……か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "From the very start, it was just a fake gate... huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジかよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seriously...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵の口の端から、呻きが漏れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A groan slipped from the corner of a demon soldier's mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 徒労感を強く感じさせるような光景だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a sight that strongly evoked a sense of futility.
